For those who have problem with error message "steam".

Works perfectly. The script is correct:
1 - Download using damon tools.
2 - Install
3 - Run the. exe. Will give an error message.
4 - Copy the content from SKIDROW folder and paste in root folder of the game.
5 - restart your PC.
6 - Play the game

Only then worked here. Good Luck.
